actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes (Remaining 50%)
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes as marked 50% complete. This optimizes database performance by automatically expiring old data like logs or sessions.
implementation_steps: Review current TTL index status with `db.collection.getIndexes()`.
Add missing TTL indexes e.g., `db.logs.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 86400 })` for 24h expiration.
Test index creation and verify automatic document deletion after TTL.
Update package.json scripts to include TTL validation in quality checks.

implementation_steps: Run `jest --coverage` to identify lowest coverage files (focus on src/api/routes/*).
Add 5-10 unit tests for MCP endpoints and provider failover logic.
Write integration tests for multi-provider LLM switching.
Commit and verify coverage increase via CI or local run.
